scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Holy Family on a journey. The Virgin Mary, veiled in blue and adorned with a golden halo, rides a dark horse, holding the Christ Child. The Child, dressed in a red tunic, is also haloed. To the left, Saint Joseph, wearing a grey tunic and a red cap, walks alongside the horse, his hand resting on its back. He has a beard and a serious expression. The background features a green, hilly landscape with a body of water and a distant city with prominent towers and buildings. The ground is depicted as rocky and uneven.
